short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Used to rate the credibility of Twitter tweets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Credtwi is used to gather users' opinions on tweetâ€™s credibility on their Twitter timeline. The plugin adds an additional button on the tweet's bottom bar, which opens a small question box under the tweet. This question box asks the user to rate the credibility of the tweet on a scale from 1 to 7 using a slider, and justify their rating in the text box. 

The plugin popup has the buttons to access questionnaires and also three buttons to access trendy topics.

The answers given through the Credtwi plugin are used in crowdsourcing research.
